page.title: 06A Marldon Girls Day
page.content: On Saturday I woke up at 8.00 a.m. I had 'Weetabix' for my breakfast.Then I waited for Alison to come and play. When she did, Mum and Dad said that we had to go to Paignton, and we asked Alison if she would like to come.She said she would. On the way there, we looked out of the back windows of the car and waved at people. Then Mum got out and did some shopping, while Dad went into 'Tesco' and bought some cat food.. Then we went home and we had salad for dinner, then we went outside to play.Then Alison went home. Then I had my tea and sandwiches.I watched "Wonderwoman" on T.V.. At9.00p.m. I went to bed. Before I went to sleep I read a book called"Hurrah,the Circus."
